task.title: Completing Selection Screens
task.shortdesc: To create a project in Acme Eye, you need to complete Selection Screens. You can tailor your project to your client's specific needs.

context.p: To complete the Executive Summary selection screen, follow these steps:

step.cmd: From the Document Outline, select Executive Summary.
step.stepresult: The Executive Summary screen is displayed.
The Selections for Executive Summary screen is displayed.

step.cmd: Select the checkboxes for Lines of Business, Products, Customer Business Issues, and Differentiators that apply to your customer. The figure below shows a completed Executive Summary selections screen.

fig.title: Figure: Completed Executive Summary Selections Screen

example.note: For the Executive Summary, you can only select a maximum of five customer business issues. More than five customer business issues is too much for the customer to read.
